nodes.bodyText:
Instructors can import questions from the same or other courses.
The name is a bit misleading.
GitHub Actions: 'advanceTo' is defined but never used
GitHub Actions: 'By' is defined but never used
Does it make sense to have a parameter for this and not just always set showExistingQuestionsFromCourse to true considering the other values are not parameterized too?

The same function is used to set showExistingQuestionsFromCourse to false when user clicks "from a file" button at the html file. And making it toggle like this.showExistingQuestionsFromCourse = !this.showExistingQuestionsFromCourse; would lead to irregular behavior for default selection, when user clicks add existing question.

This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            "questionTitle": "Frage Titel",
          
          
            
                            "shortQuestionTitle": "Kurzer Frage Title"
          
          
            
                            "questionTitle": "Fragen Titel",
          
          
            
                            "shortQuestionTitle": "Kurzer Fragen Title"

nodes.bodyText:
Yes, maybe the English version can be changed as well. I actually did not change the existing ones, I just moved them to translation files. I've tried to add missing German translations but  my German is not so good.

Applying your suggestion, shouldnt it then be "Kurzer Fragen Titel" or even "kurzer Fragentitel" (Fragen-Titel)? (It's still Title - should at least be Titel)

I committed the previous suggestion but should I change it again?
